descriptionHTML:
An unique time piece designed by a team of experienced in-house digital watches engineers.
The retro touches mixed with elegance and technology of the smartwatch makes this watch suitable for all ocassions.

We make smartwatches that looks like real watches, but, smarter!

All information that you need, right in your wrist.
Feratures
★ High Quality Design and Shadows that looks like REAL.
★ % Watch Battery
★ Weekday
★ Month
★ Day
★ Amazing DIM mode for Ambient.

Installation
After install, the watch will be sent automatically to the watch. It may take a minute.
Support round faces like Moto 360, LG, huawei

Feel free to contact us. before rating.
